channel.title: ThroneScape RSPS - 317 - Eco PVP PVM - Boss Pets - Ironman - OSRS Bosses
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://s15.postimg.org/hlht3dpm3/throne_SCAPE1.png[/img] [b] Welcome to ThroneScape
ThroneScape Is a new RSPS launched in 2016 and is content packed. Our Server is PVM ECO And PVP based so if you like making money without pvp you can.
ThroneScape is a 317 loading higher revision content. Our server aims to provide the content our players want. We achieve this with frequent updates and active staff. We also offer a range of unique content which you will only find on ThroneScape! [/b]
[spoiler=Features:]
[size=large]- Loyalty Points
- Bank Tabs
- Bounty Hunter
- Ironman Mode
- Ultimate Ironman Mode
- Well of Goodwill
- Automatic Voting Rewards
- Automatic Donations
- Clan Chats
- Full Gambling
- Working Dungeons
- Runespan
[/spoiler]
[spoiler=Bosses:]
- God Wars Dungeon
- Nex
- Corporeal Beast - Tormented Demons
- Dagannoth Kings
- Slash Bash
- Nomad
- Pheonix
- Bandos Avatar
- Kalphite Queen
- King Black Dragon - Chaos Elemental
- Frost Dragons - Glacors [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Minigames:]
- Warriors Guild - Pest Control - Duel Arena
- Barrows
- Fight Cave
- Fight Pits [b]- Soul Wars [/b] [b][/spoiler][/b]
[b]We have an awesome skills system and awesome training areas for each skill with all skills working.[/b]
[b] Play Via [url=http://thronescape.cf/misc.php?page=play]Webclient[/url] or [url=http://thronescape.cf/showthread.php?tid=38]Downloadable client[/url][/b] [b][size=medium] Downloadable has fullscreen and more features[/b]
[img]http://forum.ragezone.com/images/smilies/001_tt1.gif[/img][img]http://forum.ragezone.com/images/smilies/001_tt1.gif[/img][img]http://forum.ragezone.com/images/smilies/001_tt1.gif[/img][img]http://forum.ragezone.com/images/smilies/001_tt1.gif[/img][img]http://forum.ragezone.com/images/smilies/001_tt1.gif[/img][img]http://forum.ragezone.com/images/smilies/001_tt1.gif[/img][img]http://forum.ragezone.com/images/smilies/001_tt1.gif[/img][img]http://forum.ragezone.com/images/smilies/001_tt1.gif[/img][img]http://forum.ragezone.com/images/smilies/001_tt1.gif[/img] [align=center]Now some media =D
Awesome FullScreen HD Textures [img]http://s20.postimg.org/bf9bjkonx/new_not_ruse.png[/img]
Full Featured Edgville as home easy for pkers [img]http://s14.postimg.org/h0rdvc1ld/large_home_hd.png[/img]
Awesome NEX Boss [img]http://i.imgur.com/cDpzlik.jpg[/img]
Bandos Avatar [img]http://i.imgur.com/Ksus22H.jpg[/img]
Scorpia [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PZ2LgTh.jpg[/img]
Godwars [img]http://i.imgur.com/W2DP5Sq.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/6YSOHr3.png[/img] Graveyard Zombies[/align] [img]http://i.imgur.com/OC2EdWK.png[/img][/CENTER]
